mapper.select:
select
from t_factory_info where 1=1
and factory_name = #{factoryName,jdbcType=CHAR}
or
and
lower(factory_code) = lower(#{factoryCode,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into t_factory_info (id, factory_code, factory_name, manufacturer_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factoryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_factory_info
id,
factory_code,
factory_name,
manufacturer_id,

mapper.update:
update t_factory_info
factory_code = #{factoryCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
factory_name = #{factoryName,jdbcType=CHAR},
manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_factory_info where 1=1 and factory_code = #{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT f.factory_name factory_name, m.code factory_code, m.id manufacturer_id, f.factory_code oui FROM t_manufacturer_info m, t_factory_info f where f.manufacturer_id = m.id;
